fullForm: National Institute of Fashion Technology Entrance Exam
eligibility: Candidates must have passed 10+2 for undergraduate courses (B.Des, B.FTech) and a recognized undergraduate degree for postgraduate courses (M.Des, M.FTech, MFM). Detailed eligibility varies by course and is specified in the official prospectus.
duration: CAT: 3 hours; GAT: 2 or 3 hours depending on course

faqs.question: What is the structure of the NIFT Entrance Exam?
faqs.answer: The NIFT Entrance Exam consists of a General Ability Test (GAT), a Creative Ability Test (CAT), followed by a Situation Test/Studio Test and Personal Interview for shortlisted candidates. The GAT is computer-based, while the CAT and other stages are conducted offline. The exam is held once a year for admission to various undergraduate and postgraduate design, technology, and management programs.
